mcq.statement: The Ali brothers launched Khilafat Movement against British in 1920. Names of Ali brothers were ________ ?

options.a: Maulana Mauhammad Ali and Muskan Ali
options.b: Maulana Mauhammad Ali and Khilafat Ali
options.c: Maulana Mauhammad Ali and Saukat Ali
options.d: Maulana Mauhammad Ali and Nusrat Ali
